scripts.build: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && cd dist/admin && ren index.html admin.ejs && move /Y C:\Users\user\WebstormProjects\deliveries\delivery\admin\dist\admin\admin.ejs C:\Users\user\WebstormProjects\deliveries\delivery\beakend\views
scripts.buildMac: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && cd dist/admin && mv index.html admin.ejs && mv /Users/tymofiiyuzefovych/Desktop/gitlab/smart/admin/dist/admin/admin.ejs /Users/tymofiiyuzefovych/Desktop/gitlab/smart/beakend/views
scripts.build-linux-test: ng build --aot --configuration=test --build-optimizer && mv dist/admin/index.html dist/admin/admin.ejs && cp -r dist/admin/admin.ejs ../beakend/views
scripts.build-linux-prod: ng build --aot --prod --build-optimizer && mv dist/admin/index.html dist/admin/admin.ejs && cp -r dist/admin/admin.ejs ../beakend/views
